# Citation 


The rOpenSearch package release have a DOI assigned: http://dx.doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.10642

[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/3806/Terradue/rOpenSearch.png)](http://dx.doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.10642)

Cite this package as:

_Fabrice Brito et al (2014). rOpenSearch - R interface to OpenSearch v0.1. ZENODO. 10.5281/zenodo.10642_

As BibText Export:

```
@article{Fabrice:10642,
      author        = "Fabrice Brito and Emmanuel Mathot",
      title         = "{rOpenSearch - R interface to OpenSearch v0.1}",
      month         = "Jun",
      year          = "2014",
      doi           = "{10.5281/zenodo.10642}",
      url           = "{http://dx.doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.10642}",
}
```
